tool_description: Calculates seismic design forces using equivalent lateral force method or response spectrum analysis based on building properties and ground motion parameters.

building_weight.description: Total seismic weight of building in kN, range 500-50000

fundamental_period.description: Fundamental period of building in seconds, range 0.1-5.0

response_modification_factor.description: Response modification factor (R) for structural system, range 1.0-8.0

importance_factor.description: Seismic importance factor (I) based on risk category, range 1.0-1.5

floor_weights.description: Weight of each floor level in kN, from bottom to top

floor_heights.description: Height of each floor above base in meters

error_messages: Inconsistent floor data: Number of floor weights must equal number of floor heights. Verify building model.
Invalid structural system parameters: Check R, Omega0, and Cd values against code tables for specified system.
Building weight out of range: Total weight should be 500-50000 kN. Verify load calculations.
Invalid period: Fundamental period must be 0.1-5.0 seconds. Check structural analysis or use code approximation.
Spectral parameters missing: Provide design SDS and SD1 from Ground Motion Selector tool.
usage: Input building weight, period, spectral parameters from ground motion analysis, structural system factors from code tables, and floor-by-floor weight and height data. Tool calculates base shear and distributes forces to each level.

base_shear.description: Total design base shear in kN

floor_forces.description: Lateral force at each floor level in kN

period_limits.description: Upper and lower period limits for structural system
